website_summaries.verdict: Everything you look for in sunglasses by the popular, high-end designer – style, quality, and workmanship.
pros: Beautiful shades with a unique combination of durable plastic frames and metal stems
Has a slight cat-eye flair that looks both modern and classic
cons: Women with very small faces may find them too big, but they've gained compliments from owners on their trendy large style

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Sunglasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! We went to Sunglass Hut to try them on and ended up purchasing from this seller. I love them so much that I bought a pair for my husband. Same level of service and the sunglasses come with everything including the Certificate of Authenticity. It was a great experience since I did not know what to expect. It turned out great!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMommy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Great sunglasses! Love that they are a little darker lens for darker sunglasses; great for really sunny days! I don't even notice that they are not polar.
customer_reviews.author: mrsharold

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: These unique sunglasses are extremely flattering! Extra dark, (an added bonus) which was a contributing factor in making my decision to place this order, thanks to the reviews. These shades add a touch of elegance to any style of fashion. They also arrived earlier than the expected date and were professionally wrapped and placed in a beautiful Versace case, complete with documentation to verify their authenticity. They're 100% authentic Versace sunglasses!
customer_reviews.author: Customer Review

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Amazing glasses ,i was worried it will be too big for my small face ,but i love the way they fit me,very lightweight with dark lenses to protect your eyes from sun! 100% Authentic with affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: A++++ Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. I will truly recommend it to anyone. I'm loving it right now.
customer_reviews.author: M.A

customer_reviews.title: Very good seller and frames authentic!!
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful frames, very good company work with. Seller helped me make issue right and very pleased with style and comfort of frames and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Substandard. Just don’t
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses fell - not far, on to a smooth tile floor. The plastic is so soft and the lenses are such cheap plastic they scratched beyond use. Worn once. I got for use after eye surgery because they are light weight. Subpar. Don't bother. I would have returned but due to surgery was unable to get on to Amazon to do so until after the return expiry.
customer_reviews.author: Avatar1

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice but possibly gently used
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shades on. I do believe my shades were gently used. The versace box looked pretty worn but the case and shades are in good condition. There's a small scratch on the frame nobody would probably notice. I believe they are definitely authentic. They look great on. Therefore I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tammi dyer

customer_reviews.title: Good business
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these pair of sunglasses for my wife's birthday. The sunglasses itself are a hit, and my wife just loves 'em. Shipping?! I didn't even get to breathe and the package was at my door... super fast!! Wow! And yeah, payed half of what would have paid at a big chain store! Five stars and fully recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Castle

customer_reviews.title: So far good! I compared them a couple of times to ...
customer_reviews.text: So far good! I compared them a couple of times to Macy's store and I couldn't tell the difference. So I think they were legit, would rebuy again
customer_reviews.author: nanis

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: This sunglasses look solid, I'm going to give them to my mother for her birthday. i think they will make my mother look great. i think the gradient lenses are really elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Nerazzurri

customer_reviews.title: Classy lovely look
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cateye shades by Versace. I feel fab in these!
customer_reviews.author: IslandBeauty

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Not sure if they are the real deal. Emblems had fallen off during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Brizendine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. I have a small face so it is hard for me to find glasses that fit and look nice. These are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: YaYa

customer_reviews.title: Nice style
customer_reviews.text: Love these - just the perfect amount of cat eye!!
customer_reviews.author: CTM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these shades
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shades. Can't wait to wear them outside. It's looks even better then the picture. Love, love, love!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on these sunglasses. They fit great, nice and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Goldensandra

customer_reviews.title: More like Payless. Next time I will listen to my ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give 0 stars. Versace???!!! More like Payless. Next time I will listen to my husband and go for Gucci. His are way stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Dehess89

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are so nice and fit my face perfectly. absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Alireza

customer_reviews.title: Love this glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love this glasses. Comfortable to wear. They are big, but that's the style. They look good on my small face.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Reiss

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality very nice case I love it thanks 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Maria G Leon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality not fake but it doesn't suit my face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY, CANT GO WRONG WITH THESE GLASSES!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY NEW GLASSES, LIGHTWEIGHT AND STEADY AND DARK. THEY ACTUALLY PROTECT MY EYES. WELL WORTH THE MONEY SINCE THEY ARE WAY CHEAPER THEN AT THE STORE. THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elina Petrosova

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks real so far, hope it's not a knock off.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Mother day gift, all what I can say my mother in law loved it, and I saved over $100 difference using amazon vs Macy's!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T

product_meta.title: Versace Womens Sunglasses (VE4292) Acetate
product_meta.description: Versace phantos black acetate sunglasses with light grey/dark blue gradient lenses. Come in a designer-stamped case.
